articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he is "fine" despite admitting his sleep and diet are being affected by the worst run of results in his entire managerial career.
articles.title: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola on management pressures before Manchester United game

articles.description: Football Association chair Debbie Hewitt tells BBC Radio 5 Live it "wasn't a difficult decision" to back Saudi Arabia's bid to host the 2034 men's World Cup.
articles.title: Saudi 2034 World Cup: FA chair Debbie Hewitt says it 'wasn't a difficult decision' to back bid

articles.description: England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland discover their 2026 World Cup qualifying opponents following Friday's draw in Zurich.
articles.title: World Cup 2026 qualifying draw: England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland discover opponents

articles.description: Controversial changes to the statutes of Formula 1's governing body approved on Friday constitute a "worrisome concentration of power", according to the head of one of its member clubs.
articles.title: FIA: Changes voted through by Formula 1's governing body are criticised

articles.description: Julen Lopetegui says West Ham's players will visit Michail Antonio in hospital as he continues to recover after a "miracle" escape from a car crash.
articles.title: Michail Antonio: West Ham players to visit team-mate in hospital after car crash

articles.description: BBC Sport answers the key questions around Juan Soto, baseball players' high salaries, and why MLB contracts are so long.
articles.title: Juan Soto: Who is he and why is he paid so much?

articles.description: Who are the winners and losers in Stephan Shemilt's just-for-fun awards to the England men's Test team?
articles.title: England men's Test team - Stephan Shemilt's 2024 awards

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "focusing on our own problems" over the struggles of rivals Manchester City before Sunday's derby at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim says side are focused 'on own problems' not Man City's struggles

articles.description: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price made weight for their respective welterweight world title defences on Saturday in Liverpool.
articles.title: Boxing: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price make weight for world title defences in Liverpool

articles.description: Nina Wilson said she wants Maddy Cusack's death to lead to more support for young players.
articles.title: Maddy Cusack's Sheffield Utd teammate: Players need more support
